Skill.label: 1-12 Caustic Arrow - Void Manip at lvl 8
12 - Toxic Rain - Clear/Single target - VP @ lily
12+ Caustic extra single target - Vicious P @lily

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
HEY IF YOU'RE HAVING TROUBLES YOU SHOULD 100% JUST COME TO ----> -----> twitch.tv/tripolarbare <------ <------ my build video --------->https://tinyurl.com/TRPolar
PROBLEMS YOU MIGHT HAVE -If you're getting one shot in maps, make sure you're resistances are capped, you have a warding flask, and that your flasks are up for the majority (90%) of the map.
-If you're boss damage is lacking, make sure you're using wither totems and have a 6L, and are using level 20 gems. If you need more damage, get awakened versions of your gems, and keep an eye out for the cluster jewels outlined in the pob and video
